text: “There is genuine cause to celebrate a remarkable British scientific achievement.” – PM @BorisJohnson announces that a new coronavirus treatment developed by @UniOfOxford will be made available across the NHS. https://t.co/nwTSSXLKSK

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus
